instance_template: cpu("Ryzen7", 300). cpu("i9", 400). cpu("Xeon", 500). gpu("RTX4060", 350). gpu("RTX3090", 700). gpu("Quadro", 800). mobo("X670", 180). mobo("Z690", 200). mobo("C621", 250). psu("Bronze", 80). psu("Gold", 120). psu("Platinum", 160). high_power("RTX3090"). high_power("Quadro").
generator: 1 { selected_cpu(C) : cpu(C, Cost) } 1. 1 { selected_gpu(G) : gpu(G, Cost) } 1. 1 { selected_mobo(M) : mobo(M, Cost) } 1. 1 { selected_psu(P) : psu(P, Cost) } 1.

hard_constraints.description: The utilization of a high-power graphics processing unit is prohibited in conjunction with a Bronze-rated power supply unit.
The selection of a Xeon processor necessitates the selection of a C621 architectural motherboard.
An AMD Ryzen 7 processor must be paired exclusively with an X670 chipset motherboard.
The concurrent selection of an Intel i9 processor and an X670 motherboard is logically excluded.
Provision of a Quadro graphics card implies the mandatory inclusion of a Xeon central processing unit.
A Quadro graphics card is incompatible with the Z690 motherboard configuration.

soft_constraints.description: A penalty is incurred equivalent to the financial cost of the selected central processing unit.
soft_constraints.asp_rule: penalty("cpu_cost", C, Cost) :- selected_cpu(C), cpu(C, Cost).

soft_constraints.description: A penalty is incurred equivalent to the financial cost of the selected graphics processing unit.
soft_constraints.asp_rule: penalty("gpu_cost", G, Cost) :- selected_gpu(G), gpu(G, Cost).

soft_constraints.description: A penalty is incurred equivalent to the financial cost of the selected motherboard component.
soft_constraints.asp_rule: penalty("mobo_cost", M, Cost) :- selected_mobo(M), mobo(M, Cost).

soft_constraints.description: A penalty is incurred equivalent to the financial cost of the selected power supply unit.
soft_constraints.asp_rule: penalty("psu_cost", P, Cost) :- selected_psu(P), psu(P, Cost).

global_objective: #minimize { Cost, Type, Item : penalty(Type, Item, Cost) }.
